name: Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight
Lore: 'Scout trained in the ways of the Force. Key figure for both the Alliance and the Empire. Desired by Vader as an ally, by Palpatine as a servant and by the Alliance as its savior.',
Text: 'Deploys -3 to Home One or Endor. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Power +2 when armed with a lightsaber. Subtracts 3 from any attempt to cross him over (even if captured). Immune to attrition < 5 (< 6 if alone or armed with a lightsaber, < 7 if both).',
